name: Creatures 3
description: GOG version (Creatures Exodus). Docking Station's launch not supported yet. The egg layer doesn't work so you'll have to start with the adult norns...

files.file1:
N/A:Select the Creatures Exodus installer provided by GOG. You can download it here: 
https://secure.gog.com/downlink/creatures_exodus/en1installer0

content:
files:
- file1: "N/A:Select the Creatures Exodus installer provided by GOG. You can download\
    \ it here: \nhttps://secure.gog.com/downlink/creatures_exodus/en1installer0"
game:
  args: --autokill
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Creatures Exodus/Creatures 3/engine.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    args: /silent /nogui
    executable: file1
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
